name: Cyborg Identity Attack
description:
Use your mouse to place towers to defend against hoards of enemies. 

Right click places towers that shoot to the left
Left click places towers that shoot to the Right
Middle Click to remove towers

Story:

You are a cyborg secret agent, but after a night of hoping around the dark web, your mind has been infected with trojans and malware trying to figure out your identity. If they reach the center of your robotic mind, you will become a brain dead statistic on a kill list.
